flawed_nl_solution:
Kevin has (16 + 5)/3 = <<(16+5)/3=7>>7 candy bars.
Nicole has 7 + 4 = <<7+4=6>>6 candy bars.
Lena has 16 - 6 = <<16-6=10>>10 more candy bars than Nicole
#### 10

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 11, not 6. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
